text: None se ni nde munyabyaha kurusha uwahimbiye Allah ikinyoma cyangwa uwahinyuye amagambo ye? Abo bazagerwaho n’umugabane wabo (w’ibihano hano ku isi) Allah yabageneye, kugeza ubwo intumwa zacu (abamalayika bashinzwe gukuramo roho) zizabageraho zikabavanamo roho zivuga ziti “Ibyo mwasengaga mu cyimbo cya Allah biri he?” Bazavuga bati “Nta byo tubona”, maze na bo bishinje ko bari abahakanyi
